net.pandoragames.far.ui.swing

Class ComponentRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.pandoragames.far.ui.swing.ComponentRepository

  • public class ComponentRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates and deploys some Swing components that are supposed to be availabel accross different places in the application.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner at 03.03.2008
